business_use_case: Implement an intuitive social trading feature that allows users to connect with other traders, share insights, and replicate successful trades. This feature should enable users to follow top-performing traders, access a community feed showcasing real-time trades and strategies, and engage through comments or likes. Users should have the option to mirror trades automatically with a customizable risk management setting to fit their financial goals. The feature encourages a collaborative trading environment while providing a seamless way to execute informed trading decisions. Security and privacy will be prioritized, ensuring safe interaction and data handling. This aims to enhance user engagement and empower less experienced traders with valuable real-world insights and strategies shared within the community.
